posts.post_content:
Hey Gang:

So I am looking for a green portrait Cobby.  Looking for a nice 2 or 3 but would really love to find one that is centered opposed to the typical t/b oc but would be willing to look at anything.  I don't have much for trade though so probably a straight cash deal.  Thanks for looking.
i have a sgc 2.5.  if you send me your email address i will send you pics and price.  my email is [url]jdb435@nyu.edu[/url].  thanks, james
Still looking, love to see whatever you have.
